text: Jan Topić (born April 23, 1983) is an Ecuadorian businessman and politician. He was born in Guayaquil, Guayas. He is running for President of Ecuador in the 2023 election. He has been president of Telconet since 2010. In 2019, he was investigated for money laundering during the Odebrecht Case. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Ecuadorian businesspeople
title: Jan Topić
